NAVBAR.HELPTEXT:
Documentation and source code for the wallet can be found here:

https://github.com/xaya/xaya

General help is available through the community site at:

https://forum.xaya.io/

Questions that must be posed in confidence can be sent to:

support@xaya.io
NAVBAR.ABOUTEXT:
Copyright Bitcoin developers, Namecoin developers and Xaya developers

Please contribute if you find Xaya useful. Visit https://xaya.io for further information about the software.
The source code is available from https://github.com/xaya/


This is experimental software.
Distributed under the MIT software license, see the accompanying file COPYING
or https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT

This product includes software developed by the OpenSSL Project for use in the
OpenSSL Toolkit https://www.openssl.org and cryptographic software written by
Eric Young and UPnP software written by Thomas Bernard.

Based on nodeJS, angular, electron and complementing packages made by different nodeJS contributors.

Current wallet version:

SOVERVIEW.FOOTERWARN: If you lose this password, you will lose all your coins in this vault wallet.

SSETTINGS.WARN: Always create a backup of your wallet. Keep your backup, keys and password in a safe place.
SSETTINGS.WARN2: Backup in this wallet is currently disabled. Browse to your datadir and manually copy your vault and game folders to a safe place. Make sure the wallet is not running.
SSETTINGS.NEEDRESTART: Settings Saved. Your wallet will close automatically now, please restart.

SADDRESSES.PLEASEFILLTHELABLE: Labels are required for receiving addresses and must be 2 characters or longer.
SADDRESSES.LABEL: Label

SSEND.CONFIRM1_COMMENT: The text should likely be deleted.
SSEND.CONFIRM2: Do you really want to send

SCONSOLE.CWARNTEXT: This is for testing only. Do not use this for sending coins or writing anything to the wallet.
